name: Dont touch Red (Sow)
description:
This is my first game. I am completely new to game development and programming in general.

The goal of the game is to Dont Touch Red and to get to the other side without touching red ofcourse ahah.

If you can do it write a comment and say you can <3 I don't believe anyone can do it.

Discord: sow#4970

add me if you want
